body:
How to Get YouTube Channel Art and Logo:

Step 1. 

Subscribe To Nitwit Gaming
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQgJGvElOcLKltAuK5DIW_Q

Step 2.

Say whether You Want a Logo Or Channel Art

Step 3.

Comment Your Email and Or Skype Name.

Step 4. 

Explain what type of channel you are (action, romantic, games) so i can determine the design.

Step 5.

Name Of Your Channel

------------------------------

EXAMPLES OF ART I'VE MADE:

http://imgur.com/XJI1wpJ
http://imgur.com/3GoZiNQ,BVocDsO,Medzxf4
http://imgur.com/3GoZiNQ,BVocDsO,Medzxf4#1
http://imgur.com/3GoZiNQ,BVocDsO,Medzxf4#2

I am Capable of Doing Almost Any Type of Channel Art Or Logo
